mapper.insert: insert into story_user(num, email, pwd, name, tel, birth, filename, filesize, cdate, p_level, sort_option, ip) values(#{num}, #{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{filename}, #{filesize}, sysdate, #{p_level}, #{sort_option}, #{ip})
mapper.select: select pwd from story_user where email=#{email}
select email from story_user where email=#{email}
select * from story_user where email = #{email} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.update: update story_user set pwd=#{pwd}, name=#{name}, tel=#{tel}, birth=#{birth}, filename=#{filename}, filesize=#{filesize}, sort_option=#{sort_option} where email=#{email}
mapper.delete: delete from story_user where email=#{email} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.select: SELECT nvl(count(*),0) FROM story_user where p_level != '4(S-Manager)' and email != #{email}
